title: Studio Anmut
description: Anmut is an architectural studio based in Padang, established in 2024. The studio specializes in architecture, design, and teaching, striving for a timeless and sensitive approach that accommodates various activities while balancing economic and design considerations.

title: Asian Society Gynecologic Oncology (ASGO) 2024
description: The 2024 Asian Society of Gynecologic Oncology (ASGO) Annual Meeting, themed “Innovative Strategies in Gynecologic Oncology: From Bench to Bedside,” will be held from April 5th to 7th at the Bali International Convention Center (BICC) in Bali, Indonesia.

title: Irama Nusantara
description: Irama Nusantara is committed to archiving and preserving Indonesian popular music, making it accessible to the public. By focusing on historical songs, the initiative ensures that these important cultural artifacts remain a vital part of the nation’s identity and heritage.

title: Rumah Imperium
description: Rumah Imperium is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing education and support for children with special needs. We believe that every child deserves a quality education, regardless of their abilities
